Template.HtmlPart: Hi {{userDisplayName}}, We've received a request to reset your password. If you didn't make the request, just ignore this message. Otherwise, you can reset your password. Reset your password {{passwordResetLink}} Thanks, {{companyAddress}}
Template.TextPart:
Hi {{userDisplayName}},
We've received a request to reset your password.
If you didn't make the request, just ignore this message. Otherwise, you can reset your password.
Reset your password
{{passwordResetLink}}

Thanks,
{{companyAddress}}
